resources.string: The "ShowServiceMode" is an application to be able to call "Secret Screen" quickly which are provided as standard maintenance menu. Regardless of whether or not you can call successfully on your models, this implements a lot of method of multiple calls which can call.
Run with the above settings choosed
When you create a shortcut on HOME screen, you will be able to open the screen with one touch from HOME screen. And also you will be able to make calls to multiple different ways.
Create a shortcut to the HOME screen with the above setting

To malfunction or trouble due to the change the setting, the developer does not take any responsibility. Please use this on your own risk. By the settings, all data disappear, or continue to occur is an error as the case may be. Actaully there may be a risk that would prevent the call. Additionally, the screen after the call is not a ShowServiceMode app. Please use on the understanding, is that users should not change the settings easily. Sorry, support for foreign language is difficult. Developers can understand only Japanese.
Information\nWhen you have something troubles or have to share the status report, please provide the following information.
This is provided, like an evaluation version, as free version for information providers. You will be asked to provide information such as Bug reports and behavior which you find out.

I\'m very sorry that ShowServiceMode recognizes you are NOT using official version, and unfortunately this is used illegally pirated. Some of feature will be limited. Would much appreciate if you could make sure your account of Google Play or the connection to Internet. This message is shown even thought you have already purchased for this application on Google Play, please kindly let me know. Basically in the case of the message appears, you fail to activate.
ERROR! Has detected the error before calling run. In this model how this call is not valid. Please try the other methods.
ERROR! Calling failed. Calling parameters are invalid. May be a call from the old shortcut. Please re-create the shortcut.
Sorry.\nDue to the version up, I change the format of the shortcut.\nPlease re-create the shortcut again.
I Love the ShowServiceMode. Purchase GooglePlay.
